heading: HR00117
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION (CHED) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) TO JOINTLY STUDY, RESEARCH AND CONSIDER THE REVISION OF THE CURRENT COLLEGE CURRICULA BY REDUCING THE RESIDENCY OF STUDENTS FROM 5 YEARS TO FOUR YEARS FOR FIVE-YEAR DEGREE COURSES AND FROM FOUR YEARS TO THREE YEARS FOR FOUR-YEAR DEGREE COURSES AND SUBMIT THE RESULT OF SUCH STUDY SOONEST POSSIBLE TO THE CONGRESS OF THE PHILIPPINES FOR THE PASSAGE OF AN APPROPRIATE LEGISLATIVE ACTION
principal-authors: SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.; SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P.;
status: Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-06
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00117
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION (CHED) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) TO JOINTLY STUDY, RESEARCH AND CONSIDER THE REVISION OF THE CURRENT COLLEGE CURRICULA BY REDUCING THE RESIDENCY OF STUDENTS FROM 5 YEARS TO FOUR YEARS FOR FIVE-YEAR DEGREE COURSES AND FROM FOUR YEARS TO THREE YEARS FOR FOUR-YEAR DEGREE COURSES AND SUBMIT THE RESULT OF SUCH STUDY SOONEST POSSIBLE TO THE CONGRESS OF THE PHILIPPINES FOR THE PASSAGE OF AN APPROPRIATE LEGISLATIVE ACTION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B., SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-26
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-06
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-03;
